lead_paragraph: CODEY--John. The Wildlife Conservation Society expresses sincere condolences to the family and colleagues of John Codey. John was a champion for the environment and his passion and support from the Leona M. and Harry B. Helmsley Charitable Trust has had a significant impact in countries like Myanmar and Madagascar. WCS was fortunate to work with him in these two countries and in efforts to build capacity for environmental stewardship by future generations. We will miss his enthusiasm across our field sites, but will celebrate his vision in our continued work. 1/3
